abstract: Interview with Joy Williams and John Paul White, members of folk-pop duo Civil Wars.
snippet: The songwriters Joy Williams and John Paul White reflect on what it’s like to be noticed.
lead_paragraph: The songwriters Joy Williams and John Paul White reflect on what it’s like to be noticed.

headline.main: Their Year of Living Almost Famously
